title: (x) "Listen Silent" anagram gorgeous monospace sans - hand drawn {James Mark Hatley}
content:
Hi!

I’m trying to find the name of that font  
 [http://www.taubaauerbach.com/images/LISTENSILENT(ANAGRAMII).jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080207073442/http:/www.taubaauerbach.com/images/LISTENSILENT(ANAGRAMII).jpg)

Its a gouache artwork, so it might not even exist :( I tried what the font and it didnt find anything similar. The S and I are very particuliar.

Thanks for any help!

Audrée

 [‹ Iceberg logo semi-slabserif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080207073442/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41646 "Go to previous forum topic") [Björk "Volta" constructed geometric sans ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080207073442/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41639 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Audree

comments.content: Looks like a hand and brush to me.
it is, but he could have used a font that exists as a model.
Tauba does all her type works custom.
